django.contrib.gis.db.backends.base.models
==========================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.backends.base.models


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.base.models.SpatialRefSysMixin


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: SpatialRefSysMixin

   The SpatialRefSysMixin is a class used by the database-dependent
   SpatialRefSys objects to reduce redundant code.


   .. py:property:: srs

      Return a GDAL SpatialReference object.


   .. py:property:: ellipsoid

      Return a tuple of the ellipsoid parameters:
      (semimajor axis, semiminor axis, and inverse flattening).


   .. py:property:: name

      Return the projection name.


   .. py:property:: spheroid

      Return the spheroid name for this spatial reference.


   .. py:property:: datum

      Return the datum for this spatial reference.


   .. py:property:: projected

      Is this Spatial Reference projected?


   .. py:property:: local

      Is this Spatial Reference local?


   .. py:property:: geographic

      Is this Spatial Reference geographic?


   .. py:property:: linear_name

      Return the linear units name.


   .. py:property:: linear_units

      Return the linear units.


   .. py:property:: angular_name

      Return the name of the angular units.


   .. py:property:: angular_units

      Return the angular units.


   .. py:property:: units

      Return a tuple of the units and the name.


   .. py:method:: get_units(wkt)
      :classmethod:


      Return a tuple of (unit_value, unit_name) for the given WKT without
      using any of the database fields.



   .. py:method:: get_spheroid(wkt, string=True)
      :classmethod:


      Class method used by GeometryField on initialization to
      retrieve the `SPHEROID[..]` parameters from the given WKT.
